软件包 cn.mr.designPatterns.State

接口摘要
IShopState A state interface 用户在网上购物的状态变化: 选择商品 --> 生成订单 --> 付款取货
 

类摘要
GenerateBill  
Pay  
Shop  
ShopContext The context for user useing
ShopState The parent class of state
Test A test client
